thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 42 of 227
thread.title: SNichols

author: SNichols
title: SNichols
text: I was thrilled to take advantage of the BIG sale last week. Unfortunately, I am a little disappointed that I ordered 4 items and only one was able to be delivered today. 3 items are on back order - 2 could be here this week and the third in about 3 weeks. I wish that technology could have reported the outage or back order at the time of placing the order. I'm excited about my choices and can't wait for the room to be filled with my new pieces. Happy with the Lynwood chaise sofa or "chofa".
